EcoHeal: Green Planet, Responsible Generations

Join us in creating a sustainable future through environmental conservation and civic education

Get Involved Donate Now

Our Mission

"Building a greener planet and sustainable future by instilling civic responsibility and national pride through environmental and educational initiatives."

Promoting Green Practices

Encouraging sustainable habits and eco-friendly solutions in communities

Championing Civic Cleanliness

Leading community clean-up initiatives and waste management programs

Enhancing Scenic Beauty

Restoring natural landscapes and urban green spaces

Conducting Awareness Programs

Educating communities about environmental conservation

Fostering National Pride

Connecting environmental action with civic responsibility

Featured Initiatives

Discover our impactful programs making a difference in communities

Green Schools Program

Empowering the next generation with environmental education and sustainable practices. Our program aims to reache over 200 schools nationwide.

Learn More →

Community Clean-Up Drives

Mobilizing communities to restore public spaces. We aim to remove over 50 tons of waste and planted 10,000 trees in urban areas.

Learn More →
View All Programs

Support Our Mission

Your contribution helps us create a greener planet and educate responsible generations

Donate and Become a Friend of EcoHeal Foundation!

Donations made to “EcoHeal Foundation” are exempted u/s 80G of the Income Tax Act.

Account Name EcoHeal Foundation
Account Number 589205000011
Name of the Bank ICICI Bank
IFSC ICIC0005892

Donations can also be made using any UPI app.

Make a Difference Today

  • INR 1000 to plants 5 trees in deforested areas
  • INR 2500 to sponsors a community clean-up
  • INR 5000 to educates a child for one year

For any other information, please write to ecohealfoundation@gmail.com.


After making the donation, please fill in the form below to receive the donation receipt. Please do not forget to submit your PAN details for claiming IT-exemption as per Government of India rules.

Success Stories

Hear from those who've made a difference with EcoHeal

Volunteer

“Joining EcoHeal’s tree planting initiative transformed my perspective on environmental conservation. Seeing our community come together to restore the local park was incredibly rewarding. I’ve learned that small actions create big impacts.”

Community Partner

“EcoHeal’s workshops on sustainable living have been a game-changer for our neighborhood. The practical tips and community support have empowered us to make a real difference in our local environment. We’re grateful for their guidance and partnership.”
